name: Genetics (albertnez)
description:
Mix objects to create new ones and deliver the targets. Enjoy the inheritance and mutation of properties to create the stock necessary for your goals.

Game made with Godot for the Triijam 131 in 6h (instead of 3h unfortunately) - with the Theme Genetics.

Music: 

  • Smooth Lovin Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0  License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
